snippet: Advocates are concerned that cuts to the city’s child care and after-school programs could result in 47,000 children losing access to those services.
abstract: Child care advocates and families are concerned that cuts to New York City's child care and after-school programs could result in 47,000 children of working parents losing access to those services.
lead_paragraph: Advocates are concerned that cuts to the city’s child care and after-school programs could result in 47,000 children losing access to those services.

headline.seo: Mayor’s Budget Cutbacks May Threaten City Programs for Children
headline.main: Budget Cuts May Threaten City Programs for Children
headline.print_headline: Budget Cuts May Threaten City Programs for Children
